products.title: Oslo Blackout Smoke Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This medium smoke blue roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Steel Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: The beautiful thing about trinity blackout steel blue is that it allows you to lose yourself in the beautiful world of natural shades and tones. Is it a deep and moody blue? Or is it aqua blue crossed with denim? No one really knows, which means you can make it anything you want. Choosing lighter natural colours is the way to go when you want to enliven your chosen space. Think about ways to add light beiges and gentle stone greys to the mix and you'll instantly fall in love with the end result.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Baby Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Our new baby blue fabric is already proving to be one of the most popular additions to the trinity blackout collection, and with good reason. It offers a subtle texture that sits gently in the background, adding something that will be appreciated no matter which room you choose to use it in. The wonderful thing about baby blue is that you can use it to set the tone for any number of different creative avenues.

products.title: Konya Blackout Ink Blue
products.description: Konya blackoutink blue plain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade.

products.description: The palermo (blackout) bluebell couldn't be closer in shade to that of the pretty wildflower itself. This pretty yet simple blind is made from durable, wipe-clean fabric, and has all of the features of its sister blackout blinds. Use in the kitchen amidst cream walls and delicate florals for a spring-like feel and all of the cheer that comes with it, or add it to lilacs and pinks in a child's room, using it to lift out the colours in coordinating patterns.

What's more, it's made of moisture resistant material so you don't have to worry if it gets splashed with water.

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Kimono Blue Roller Blind
products.description: With a restful, japanese floral pattern, this roller blind delivers an air of zen. Intricate watercolour florals sit on graceful branches coloured in soft grey with hint of blue on a white background. Cherry blossom blackout kimono blue blackout roller blind adds the perfect finishing touch to an elegant, simple room. The blind is finished in a fabulous blackout faux silk fabric and it is pollergen treated using a specialist finish that helps to relieve hayfever symptoms by neutralising pollen.

products.title: Stripy (Blackout), Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Stripy blue is a great way of incorporating the full range of blues into your house, from sky blue, light blue, all the way to navy. Stripy blue works perfectly when you are looking to add to, or create, a blue-themed kitchen or living room, to show of the true range of tones. Alternatively, why not fit the stripy blue in the hallway or landing, to give an often overlooked area of the home a more upbeat look?
